title: NEED HELP!
body:
Hey guys I finished a norms and I got this message:

Unknown error

An unknown error has occurred

Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.

If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information. 

Thats the message pretty much what does this mean does anyone know? Thanks

replies.body:
Hey guys

Thanks for posting - we're aware and looking into it.

Cheers
Mindstar
Wow my first Riot comment! Thanks so much for your help! Appreciate it.
Please reply on this thread when you have fixed the problem thanks :)
Should be working again now - can you give it a go?
I just logged back in, the problem still persists. The error message still pops up but it's reconnected to chat.
Cool thanks!  We are working on fixing the popups too.  It is related but not quite the same system :)
It is good that a riot stuff can response that quick.
me 2 here and not able to get into chat as well
Same here. Same error message and cannot connect to chat. Seems it is ur problem, riots.
Yeah same! I can play and all that but still it is annoying because it keeps popping up
Can confirm. Keep getting this error message. Can't connect to chat either.

I'm getting the same error message and it won't let me connect to chat tried clearing some folders that were recommended if I got that message and still no change. I'm thinking its just something with the client or server and it will be fixed shortly.
Yeah same thing with me, I am sure you are right. We need riot to look at this
same thing for me, brther is still logging on chat no problem though :C
I legit just got it then right after my normals. I guess it will spread soon
